input_args.text: 'Podcast: Play in new window | Download | Embed \nPLEDGE TO THE NEWSBUD KICKSTARTER: http://kck.st/2dyYWD2 \nSpiro Skouras joins us today to update us on the operations at Newsbud.com . We discuss the new reporters, new programs and website changes that have been accomplished since the first funding drive and what they’re hoping to achieve with their latest funding drive.'
